content.text:
# List of chairmen of the Council of Ministers of the Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic

The '''chairman of the Council of Ministers of the Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic''' was the second-highest official in the Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic, which was in turn a part of the Soviet Union.
Below is a list of office-holders:
{| class="wikitable"
! Name
! Entered office
! Left office
|-
|Vilis Lācis(1904–1966)
|August 25, 1940
|November 27, 1959
|-
|Jānis Peive(1906–1976)
|November 27, 1959
|April 23, 1962
|-
|Vitālijs Rubenis(1914–1994)
|April 23, 1962
|May 5, 1970
|-
|Jurijs Rubenis(1925–2004)
|May 5, 1970
|October 6, 1988
|-
|Vilnis Edvīns Bresis(1938–2017)
|October 6, 1988
|May 7, 1990
|}
See also
*Prime Minister of Latvia

Sources
